ing: 2 1/2 cups tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8Â®)
3 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and cut into bite-sized pieces
1 (8 ounce) can chopped tomatoes with juice
1 lemon, juiced, or more to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®), or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Chunks of fresh avocado are combined with a fresh, bright broth to make a refreshing chilled soup."
ins: Mix tomato-vegetable juice, vegetable broth, tomatoes, avocados, cucumber, canned tomatoes with juice, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, olive oil, green onions, lemon juice, cilantro, vinegar, hot pepper sauce, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl. Cover and chill for at least 3 hours before serving to allow flavors to blend.
